post.author: Sonia
post.content:
Hi Sonia,

Thank you for speaking with me today.  As per our conversation, feel free to provide my contact information to your referral.  Below are some details on the job opportunity.

Position: Technical Support / Help Desk
Location:  Mississauga
Type: One year contract with possibility of permanent placement
Environment:  Call Centre

Job Qualifications:

- Post Secondary education in computer science or equivalent college related diploma;
- Technical certifications preferred but not required (i.e. A+ or MCSE or CCNA);
- Bilingual (Korean/English);
- 1+ year customer service/technical support experience.

Technical Skills:

- Windows applications
- Switches
- Unix, Linux
- Networking
- General SAN Storage knowledge

* You must be available to work rotating shifts in a 24/7 environment (days, evenings, nights, weekends). *


Thank you  and have a good day!


Sangeeta Master, Regional Staffing Associate
Eagle Professional Resources Inc. (EAGLE)
67 Yonge Street, Suite 200
Toronto, ON  M5E 1J8

Tel: 416-861-1492 x2227
Toll-Free: 1-800-281-2339 x2227
Fax: 416-861-8401
Toll-Free Fax: 1-866-861-9275
http://www.eagleonline.com
"High Altitude Staffing"
post.title: Technical Support / Help Desk - New Position
